## General Overview {.smaller}

1.  Create a scanner which can collect local population data outdoors and indoors

    -   [Indoor scanner work still ongoing]{.emph .green}
    -   [IRB project closed - will reopen at UNL this Spring]{.emph .green}

2.  Create an algorithm to identify familiar class characteristics

    -   [New approach with synthetic data]{.emph .cerulean}

3.  Generate a local database of common footwear features

4.  Use local database to characterize frequency of similar shoes in local population

## Synthetic Pattern Generation {.smaller}

-   Use [SoleMate style labeling](SoleMate.pdf) for examiner familiarity

-   Generate data in multiple formats: [maximum model flexibility]{.emph .purple}
